Articles.Content:
Hello! Let me introduce u the latest fighters crafts from G technologies:

-F-11 Dragon: a small delta wing craft perfect for short missions with decent maneuverability and stability

-Sr72 blackbird: a reinterpretation of the famous spyjet, low handling but great topspeed

-Lightning mk2: a really fast interceptor

-YF-57 Hayabusa: a stealth fighter with exceptional maneauverability

-FA-37 Talon: outstanding handling and stability

-FA-37 Talon version V: if a thing looks better it flyes better? featuring 4 engines, negative wings, buttons for switch engines and toggle thrust vectoring for a full control of the vehicle! "This is the state of art of G technologies!"

IMPORTANT NOTE: all my crafts needs the B9 mod for works, the sr 72 blackbird needs B9 and JAWRD_C7_bicoupler link:http://www./download/2nintx2ogawysd6/JAWRD_C7_Mk2Bicoupler_V1.1.zip.

craft files:

FA-37 Talon version V http://www./?fi8lmcgyi993piq

YF-57 Hayabusa http://www./?qbreyeqo6344fpi

Sr-72 Blackbird http://www./?h32avdlod8fo0by

F-11 Dragon http://www./?8uj5ppx18vxr44x

Lightning mk2 http://www./?bg24k6f5fhlwb44

FA-37 Talon http://www./?dtupndcrelp3c2o

Let me know if there are bugs or something that dont works.

Edited October 13, 2013 by eorin
Tell me what do u think about these crafts, so maybe i can improve it
Are you using Procedural Wings? You should Use them.

Hi this is a replica of the beautifull JAS 39 gripen

Well this is not actually a mod craft, but it is still a G technologies craft!

link download:

http://www./download/q1tira9or4eox7f/JAS_39_gripen_C(2).craft

Edited October 13, 2013 by eorin
Nice work eorin. Looks like you achieved the JAS 39 gripen without mods. Applause !

this time i've try some hard, a replica of the eurofighter typhoon all stock parts

download

http://www./download/2xe0eq06acw6eoq/eurofighter_typhoon.craft

FEEDBACK IS APRECIATED!

Edited October 13, 2013 by eorin

First, a question. On the gripen and the eurofighter, what is the piece you use behind the cockpit to give the craft more realistic shapes?

Second, some suggestions:

Pressing F1 will take a screenshot and place it in your KSP screenshots folder.

Pressing F2 will hide the UIs (only for aesthetic purposes)

Nice craft, though.

-Ojimak
The piece behind the cockpit appears to be a B9 intake scoop, making it not pure stock.

The piece behind the cockpit appears to be a B9 intake scoop, making it not pure stock.

Sorry i was thinking it was a stock part, i will change it, thanks for the advice, and thanks to ojimak for the suggestions!
As a military aircraft fanatic, I have to say those crafts look fantastic! Well done.

Nice work eorin. Looks like you achieved the JAS 39 gripen without mods. Applause !

Pretty sure that part right after the cockpit is a B9 intake
gripen and eurofighter fixed! now they are pure stock

Macchi mc 210 special

This craft requires B9 and firespitter for work. Hope u like it

download

http://www./download/4fd7wjif8h7749n/macchi_210_special.craft
